meaningMnemonic: I want to take the <kanji>whole</kanji> and <kanji>fasten</kanji> it together. Take all the parts and put it together in a <vocabulary>synthesis</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>recap</vocabulary> of the information.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
